navList.name: TetraPay specializes in innovative payment technology and security, offering users with a safe and practical solution for a new era in mobile payment and financial possibilities.

pay.title: Pay
pay.text: We equip your cell phone with a powerful QR code reader and payment slips,point,scan and make the payment

receive.title: Receive
receive.text: Set how much you want to receive,display the code generanted for those who will pay to receive you money

send.title: Send
send.text: Sending money doesn’s have to be complicanted.Friends,family and other contacts can easily receive you money

manage.title: Manage
manage.text: Manage,exchange and invest your assets with our multichain wallet. Check you balance and expenses.Fast,easy and safe

Census.text: A 1:1 anchored digital stable currency issued relying on banks, settlement agencies, and commercial institutions in each country; ensuring value anchoring through strict mathematical models, and relying on financial services such as wealth management, lending, insurance and other financial services to ensure user profitability while removing hidden costs in currency circulation. Our goal is to achieve a free flow of various anchored currencies.

Much.title: Much More Than Just a Wallet

info.c: Pay Anywhere in Any Currency Available

info.b: The agreement and algorithm of the TetraPay currency system ensures that the price of the Tetra currency is relatively stable, which is suitable for long-time savings. The system will also provide a higher incentive ratio for users who save regularly, obtaining a return on investment significantly higher than any commercial bank’s interest rate.
info.d: Staking, Pledged Loans and many other financial opportunities straight from our app

manage.title: Fast Real-Time Confirmation
manage.text: Using Polkadot's cross-chain protocol, assets can be directly pledged or liquidated into local fiat currency, quickly settled, and confirmed in milliseconds.

exchange.title: Deep Learning Mode
exchange.text: Original Rui's algorithm is based on the combination of machine learning, artificial intelligence and offline economic models, so that the exchange rate have minimal fluctuations and is more convenient for offline payments.

invest.title: Agency Payment Mechanism
invest.text: Merchants bear the gas cost when users pay,so that the user can pay without loss, and the merchant will receive a subsidy to offset the gas costs.

text.a: Build a Polkadot parallel chain tetra chain based on Substrate
text.b: Payara benchmark algorithm, Oracle price anchoring, and Tetra exchange
text.c: Launch of TetraChain mainnet to test the switch of TetraPay Payment App from the source chain to TetraChain
text.d: Realize savings and other defi business needs

text.a: TetraPay Payment App test launch in Brazil and South Korea
text.c: Expansion to SEA market (Thailand, Vietnam, Malaysia, and others)
text.d: Global expansion (Europe, North America and other territories)

check.a: Check our app for a full lish of partnered establishments
check.b: I want to accredit my establishment
